articles.title: What to expect (and not expect) from yet another September Apple event - Ars Technica
articles.description: An all-new iPhone variant, plus a long list of useful (if predictable) upgrades.

articles.author: Katie Notopoulos, Peter Kafka
articles.title: Donald Trump summoned Big Tech CEOs to a White House dinner. We decided to zoom in on the seating chart. - Business Insider
articles.description: Donald Trump's Big Tech dinner included guests Mark Zuckerberg, Bill Gates, Tim Cook, and Sam Altman. Let's examine the seating chart.
articles.content:
Katie Notopoulos: Let's talk about the seating arrangements of the Trump dinner with tech CEOs. The photos are causing me intense thirdhand discomfort.
The first thing that jumps out is who is seate… [+5431 chars]
